channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Uzbekistan’s mobile bank TBC bags $37M to expand with new AI and insurance products
item.description: Uzbekistan's mobile-exclusive bank, TBC Bank Uzbekistan, has raised $37 million to bolster its footprint in the Central Asian nation. © 2024 TechCrunc...

item.title: Sequoia’s Matt Miller is exiting the firm after making headlines earlier this year
item.description: The writing was on the wall, seemingly. Sequoia Capital partner Matt Miller announced on Wednesday that he’s leaving the powerhouse outfit after a 12-...

item.title: 14 Best Office Chairs of 2024— I've Tested 55+ to Pick Them
item.description: Sitting at a desk for hours? Upgrade your WFH setup and work in style with these comfy WIRED-tested seats.

item.title: Generative AI Still Needs to Prove Its Usefulness
item.description: The hype is fading, and people are asking what generative artificial intelligence is really good for. So far, no one has a decent answer.

item.title: European Solo GP Robin Capital closes first fund with €15M to play with
item.description: Robin Capital — the Germany-based, Solo GP-led VC fund by former entrepreneur Robin Haak — has hit its final close of ‘Robin Fund One’ at €13 million....

item.title: British university spinoff Mindgard protects companies from AI threats
item.description: AI creates a dilemma for companies: Don’t implement it yet, and you might miss out on productivity gains and other potential benefits; but do it wrong...

item.title: 2025 Will Be Smart Glasses All the Way Down
item.description: The past year has been filled with announcements about new smart glasses from companies big and small. Don’t expect the deluge to let up anytime soon.

item.title: eBay Coupon Codes and Deals: Up to 60% Off Select Items
item.description: Save up to 60% on a selection of items at eBay, including electronics, home products, card games, and more.

item.title: Bluesky adds mentions tab in the notifications screen and username squatting protection
item.description: Social network Bluesky has released a new update to its app that includes a separate mentions tab in notifications, protections against username squat...

item.title: Use the ‘Anti-AI’ Camera Apps Zerocam and Hallide to Keep Your Photos Looking More Natural
item.description: It’s still possible to just take normal-looking photos. Use these apps for Android and iOS to give your phone’s camera a more natural eye.
